Minor Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in all courses applied to the minor.

Complete the following:: SOWK 260 - Social Welfare, Social Policy, and Social Work I (3)
SOWK 388 - Human Behavior and the Social Environment (3)

Complete 9 credits from the following:: SOWK 311 - Introduction to Field Experience in Social Work (3)
SOWK 360 - Social Welfare, Social Policy, and Social Work II (3)
SOWK 369 - Contemporary Issues, Cultures, and Social Work Practices in Aging (3)
SOWK 370 - Social Work and the Criminal Justice System (3)
SOWK 372 - Social Work and Health Care (3)
SOWK 373 - Demystifying the DSM: A Social Work Perspective (3)
SOWK 374 - Social Work with Immigrants and Refugees (3)
SOWK 376 - Intimate Partner Violence, A Social Work Perspective (3)
SOWK 387 - Policies, Programs, and Services for Children (3)
SOWK 390 - Special Topics in Social Welfare (1-3)
